images.description: The only surviving wonder; a massive limestone pyramid built as a tomb for Pharaoh Khufu.
A legendary series of terraced gardens said to have been built in ancient Babylon.
A giant seated statue of Zeus made of ivory and gold, standing over 40 feet tall.
A massive marble temple dedicated to the goddess Artemis, rebuilt multiple times.
A monumental tomb built for Mausolus, known for its sculptural beauty.
A giant bronze statue of the sun god Helios that stood over 100 feet tall.
A 300-foot lighthouse guiding sailors to Alexandriaâ€™s harbor; one of the tallest structures of its time.
